Grand Prince Yixin (1833-1898), sixth son of Emperor Daoguang, prominent politician, diplomat and modernizer in late Qing

sentences.english: The third interpretation attributes the practice to Fu Jin, the Princes of Gong of the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三种解释跟清朝的恭亲王福晋有关。

sentences.english: Prince Gong, Yixin, was the sixth son of Emperor Daoguan.
sentences.chinese: 恭亲王奕★是道光皇帝的第六个儿子。

sentences.english: In the 1930s, the palace was bought by Furen Catholic University.
sentences.chinese: 二十世纪三十年代，恭亲王府被辅仁大学买下办学。

sentences.english: Yu prince blessing entire Hongs in a hurry, the respectful prince often preferably also immediately went.
sentences.chinese: 裕亲王福全薨了没多久，恭亲王常宁也随之去了。
